entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023
